and Awareness</title>     <link href="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/life-sciences/news/water-4-life.aspx" />     <author>       <name>Catherine Bird</name>     </author>     <summary>Congratulations Kang Nee for receiveing the PhAMA's president Award for Community Impact and Awareness. The money will be donated back to the community's children via Kang Nee's next mission for climb for Life 2.</summary>     <published>2014-12-02T17:37:00Z</published>     <updated>2015-01-05T15:04:00Z</updated>     <media:thumbnail url="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk%2fLife-Sciences%2fimages-multimedia%2fPhamaward-541-(2)-Cropped-100x100.jpg" />     <id>http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/life-sciences/news/water-4-life.aspx</id>   </entry> </feed>
